abstract.t: Many user applications and the transport protocols that make thempossible require two-way communications. To address this need, andalso for system simplicity, round-trip loss measurements arefrequently conducted in practice. The Two-Way Active MeasurementProtocol specified in RFC 5357 establishes a round-trip lossmeasurement capability for the Internet. However, there is currentlyno metric specified according to the RFC 2330 framework.This memo proposes/adds round-trip loss to the set of IP PerformanceMetrics (IPPM).
